entity.name: city
entity.query: select id, country_id, `name`, name_en, `desc` from mx_city

entity.name: country
entity.query: SELECT id ,`name`,`en_name`,`desc`,seo_keywords FROM mx_country WHERE id = ${city.country_id}

entity.name: tag
entity.query: SELECT B.tag_name FROM mx_tag_relate A LEFT JOIN mx_tag B ON A.tag_id = B.id WHERE A.source_type = 1 AND A.source_id = ${city.id}
